about_the_game:
Create a hero and start your adventure in Nordicandia!

★ Choose your class
Adventure forth as a mighty Warrior, agile Hunter or a powerful Mage. Assign Attributes to specialize your Character, and unlock unique Active and Passive Skills as you progress.

★ Auto move and attack
Your character will target and attack monsters automatically, you can click-to-move and use skills and potions in strategic moments.

★ Accessible gameplay
Play actively as much as you want, or let your character gain Experience and Loot even when you're away from your computer!

★ Deep crafting system
Merge stats from one item to another with Essences at the Blacksmith, disassemble items, and use relics to further empower your equipment!

★ Skills for your playstyle
Invest points into skill masteries to customize your gameplay.
Do you prefer an active playstyle, or do you want to be more passive and boost your character's AFK power?
The choice is yours!

★ Defeat challenging bosses
Battle against Beasts, Demons, Orcs, Dragons and more, in many different worlds, and defeat the fiercest of bosses for epic rewards!
Venture into side areas and encounter unique challenges.

★ Playable offline
After downloading the required game data you can hack and slash your way through monsters even when you don't have an internet connection!

★ Compete in Seasons and the Leaderboard
Compete with other players in Seasons and receive epic rewards, there is no level cap!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04.5 or equivalent
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04.2.0
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
